metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0481 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in NFC could enable a proximateattacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of a privilegedprocess. This issue is rated as High because it could be used to gain localaccess to elevated capabilities, which are not normally accessible to athird-party application. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1,6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33434992.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
